posts.post_title: 2 T3 Turkey Red coupons and a Polar Bear Tobacco coupon FS
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jim Manos
Both solid vg-ex condition both have all 76 cards listed seen in Lew Lipsets book. One is from Turkey Red Cigs and the other is Fez Cigs. Neat compliment to the set..Scans available. $125 each

Polar Bear coupon (T206 folks)
from Middleton, Ohio $125
